name: Skate Park Xtreme Ollie Tricks
description:
Get all the fun of skateboarding in your phone!

Jump on your board and own the street while you perform all kind of tricks, ollies and combos in this freestyle skateboarding game.

Become a pro skater and compete against your friends to be the best skater ever!

If you love extreme skateboarding games this is just for you!

Skate through the streets and try to be the best skater in the global leaderboards. Performing ollies and tricks is more fun than ever!

Streets are full of obstacles you should avoid, jump or grind. Go as fast as you can and collect all the gold coins while you land some ollies.
Use powerups to cheat death and don't crash. Use coins to upgrade the powerups.

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do tricks, ollies, board grabs and more!
* Online leaderboards and achievements!
* Cool skater chicks!

Skateboarding games had never been so fun!
